mapper.sql: caigousq.sqid as caigousq_sqid, caigousq.supplier_id as caigousq_supplier_id, caigousq.cg_title as caigousq_cg_title, caigousq.cg_dh as caigousq_cg_dh, caigousq.total as caigousq_total, caigousq.salesperson_id as caigousq_salesperson_id, caigousq.fksm as caigousq_fksm, caigousq.jfsm as caigousq_jfsm, caigousq.toexamine as caigousq_toexamine, caigousq.state_id as caigousq_state_id, caigousq.usestate as caigousq_usestate, caigousq.`type` as `caigousq_type`, caigousq.cg_time as caigousq_cg_time, caigousq.bz as caigousq_bz
mapper.insert: insert into caigousq (supplier_id, cg_type, cg_guige, cg_title, cg_dh, total, salesperson_id, fksm, jfsm, toexamine, state_id, usestate, `type`, cg_time, bz) values (#{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{cgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgGuige,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cgTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cgDh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{salespersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fksm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jfsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toexamine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usestate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cgTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into caigousq
supplier_id,
cg_title,
cg_dh,
total,
salesperson_id,
fksm,
jfsm,
toexamine,
state_id,
usestate,
`type`,
cg_time,
bz,
#{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cg_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cg_dh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{salesperson_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fksm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jfsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{toexamine,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update caigousq
supplier_id = #{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cg_title = #{cg_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cg_dh = #{cg_dh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
salesperson_id = #{salesperson_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fksm = #{fksm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jfsm = #{jfsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
toexamine = #{toexamine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state_id = #{state_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
usestate = #{usestate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cg_time = #{cg_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sqid = #{sqid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update caigousq set supplier_id = #{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cg_title = #{cg_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cg_dh = #{cg_dh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, salesperson_id = #{salesperson_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fksm = #{fksm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jfsm = #{jfsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toexamine = #{toexamine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state_id = #{state_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usestate = #{usestate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cg_time = #{cg_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sqid = #{sqid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select c.gd_name,c.gd_price,c.gd_number,s.supplier_name from cggoods c inner join goodsq g on g.gd_id=c.gd_id inner join caigousq a on a.sqid=g.sqid inner join supplier s on c.supplier_id=s.supplier_id where a.sqid='${sqid}'

select c.sqid,c.cg_title,c.cg_dh,c.total,c.fksm,c.jfsm,c.cg_time,c.cg_guige,c.cg_type,c.bz,s.staff_name from caigousq c left join staff s on staff_id=c.salesperson_id left join apprecords p on c.state_id=p.app_records_id where p.app_state='审批通过'

select c.sqid,c.cg_title,c.cg_dh,c.total,c.fksm,c.jfsm,c.cg_time,c.cg_guige,c.cg_type,c.bz,s.staff_name from caigousq c left join staff s on staff_id=c.salesperson_id left join apprecords p on c.state_id=p.app_records_id
cg_dh like '%${cgDh}%'
and c.total BETWEEN 0 AND '${total}'
and p.app_state='审批通过'
